body: Hi Mostapha! As I told you before, I'm experimenting with Honeybee. Right now specifically I am trying to create HB Zones from a Rhino model where all walls have different glazing ratios. I was able to do this for only 1 wall with the above solution, but then when I try to combine all walls to create a zone, nothing happens. I can upload a screenshot to see if you know whats wrong! Thanks,[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LoK3NXOIwpGYPlTCQvLoQijdmkIM-kQMjfbDJFqjVo3w8mbCwnHVERveS6pjyWbiIVE-USt9BbnUSxN4kPB6QKwKh0Fu0vnO/Katrina.png) katrina
